title: Angelium
synopsis: Zeus was an omniscient and omnipotent god who rules Heaven where gods lived. However, he was a pervert who had a wish to flirt with young angels not being known by his wife, Hera.
staff: [['Kume, Issei', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Aisaka, Naoki', ['Character Design']], ['Okazaki, Hideo', ['Director of Photography']]]
